ARABIC: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will have there everything they want and with Us there is still more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Theirs will be whatsoever they wish: And with Us there is more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therein they shall get whatever they desire; and with Us there is even more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will have therein whatever they want and will receive from Us more rewards
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In it for them is all that they may desire, and with Us is more than it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There they will have all that they desire -- and We have more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They have therein what they wish and with Us is more yet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therein they shall have whatever they will; and with Us there is yet more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There they have all that they desire, and there is more with Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There they shall have all that they desire, and there is even more with Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Theirs therein will be whatsoever they list; and with Us will be yet more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There they will have whatever they wish, and with Us there is yet more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There will be for them therein all that they wish,- and more besides in Our Presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There they will have all that they desire, and We have more (for them, i.e. a glance at the All-Mighty, All-Majestic).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There they have all that they desire, and with Us is much more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Therein they will have whatever they desire—and We have even more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:35] Therein they will have whatever they wish; and with Us there is yet more, as extra for what they did and for what they will request.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There) in Paradise (they have all that they desire, and there is more with Us) i.e. beholding Allah's Countenance; and it is said that this means: in every hour and in every day, they have with Us an increase in honour and reward.
